entry.title: Unable to view my certifications
entry.content: I am a former SAP employee and I am unable to view my certifications. Ticket is open but no replies. I need to take the stay current exam which will expire soon.

entry.title: Unable to view Digital badge after completing SAP certification exam
entry.content:
I recently passed my SAP certification exam, C_ABAPD_2507 (Backend developer - ABAP Cloud), on 23 November 2025 with 78%, but I have not yet received my certificate or digital badge.

I have already submitted a ticket (5000254053), but there has been no response from the support team so far.

I am a bit worried because my friend, who passed on the same day as me, received their certificate within a few minutes after completing the exam.

Could anyone from the SAP community please advise what I should do now? Any contacts or guidance would be greatly appreciated.

I have also linked my account with secondary e-mail address and gone through below links
https://learning.sap.com/getting-certified
https://d.dam.sap.com/a/yPyxmB


Hi @Margit_Wagner, Can you please help me with this.

Best regards,
Mohit Zanwar

entry.title: Are C_CPE and C_HAMOD right for my Java + spring boot and PL/SQL profile ?
entry.content: I have 11 years of experience as a Java Spring Boot developer and an good level in PL/SQL. I am considering pursuing SAP certifications, specifically C_CPE (SAP BTP Extension Developer) C_HAMOD (SAP HANA Cloud). Do you think these certifications are the most relevant and strategic for my profile, or would you recommend a different path within the SAP ecosystem to maximize my career opportunities?

entry.title: Is the "SAP Business Analyst Professional Certificate" by Coursera endorsed by SAP
entry.content:
Hi ALL,

I recently stumbled upon the SAP Business Analyst Professional Certificate on Coursera, however after going through the list of certifications on the SAP Certification page, it is nowhere to be found.

Is this certificate endorsed by SAP or not?

Regards,
Cruz

entry.title: Certification - When will the testing format for the certifications change?
entry.content:
Hello,

I have a couple of questions regarding SAP S/4HANA certifications

  1. Upcoming changes to test formats
    Do you know when in 2026 the testing format for the following Sourcing and Procurement certifications is planned to change from theoretica to practical?

    • C_S4CPR – SAP Certified Associate – Implementation Consultant – SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, Sourcing and Procurement

    • C_TS452 – SAP Certified Associate – SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition, Sourcing and Procurement

  2. Retirement of C_TS414 and possible replacement
    I noticed that the certification C_TS414 – SAP Certified Associate – SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition, Quality Management is going to be retired.

    • Is there a plan to introduce a similar certification for Quality Management?

    • Is there any existing or upcoming certification you would recommend as a replacement or successor to C_TS414?

Thank you in advance for any clarification you can provide.

Anna

entry.title: Error accessing SAP Learning practice system : AIG02
entry.content:
Hello SAP team ,

I am getting following error when trying to access practice system - Hands-on Practice for Solving your business problems using prompts and LLMs in SAP's Generative AI Hub , AIG02 . I need to practice for my GenAI developer certification. I have even opened the incident 5000254421 but not getting the resolution. Please help.

'There was an error when authenticating against the external identity provider: User couldn't authenticate against external identity provider. BTP shadow user not found for user provided by external identity provider. Pre-create the user or enable shadow user creation in your BTP subaccount'

URL : https://hanacloud-sharedlearning-a000001-cf-eu10-sd.ai-launchpad.prod.eu-central-1.aws.ai-prod.cloud.sap/aic/index.html

SAP Enterprise Learning  SAP Learning Solution  SAP Learning Hub 

Regards,

Amit Gupta

@DianaRoesner , @Sidharth_g

entry.title: SAP ERP MM Consultant learning journey
entry.content:
Hi all,

I'm Vasilis K., currently working as an ERP coordinator (procurement sourcing) at a telecommunications company using SAP ERP MM, mainly using (among others) the below transaction codes in order to create WBS, issue purchase requititions (PR), invoice quantitative & qualitative acceptance, etc.

cj20n, cj42, me51n, migo, zpur_rel_qa

Can you please tell me the exact learning journey (courses codes) in order to get certified as an SAP ERP MM (materials management) Consultant ?

Thank you

entry.title: Started the new SAP certification exam by mistake
entry.content:
I was trying to figure out a way to schedule an exam for the SAP Generative AI developer certification and I unknowingly clicked on the Start button on the Learning Hub. 
Now the status shows my certification exam is active for 23 hours 
I am not yet ready to give my attempt. Will this be counted as one among the four attempts I have or will the exam be deactivated after 23 hours and i will still have my 4/4 attempts?

entry.title: SAP Certification and BTP query
entry.content:
Hi Team,
I have below query, can someone clarify me.

does SAP Learning HUB license is mandatory for any SAP certification to learn from there ?

Is it possible to learn only the conversion activities of ECC to S/4 HANA from SAP portal ?


sorry if my similar queries are repeated/answered by someone/discussed previously.

Thanks, Nandha

entry.title: C_TS414_2023 SAP Certification expiring on Dec 31st 2025
entry.content:
Hi All,

I can see that SAP Certification exam for C_TS414_2023 - SAP S/4 HANA Cloud Private Edition, Quality Management is expiring on Dec 31st 2025 and there are no alternatives to this exam that I can find in the list of available SAP certifications.

Can anyone please guide me if I schedule exam for C_TS414_2023 before 31st Dec 2025 and clear it would this be applicable for 1 year till Dec 2026?

OR

 Even if I take and clear this exam before 31st Dec 2025 this wont be applicable beyond Dec 31st 2025?

OR

I wont be allowed to take this certification exam before 31st Dec 2025

Please guide and appreciate your assistance in advance for this.

Thanks,

M

entry.title: Availability of certification „C_S43 - SAP Certified Associate - SAP S/4HANA Asset Management”
entry.content:
Hello,

According the SAP announcement no exams can be scheduled after Dec 31st 2025 for the certification

  • C_S43 - SAP Certified Associate - SAP S/4HANA Asset Management

and the Certification Exam will be replaced soon with the new certification approach ‘system-based’ or ‘scenario-based’.

I found at learning.sap.com only the generic information that most of the exams shall be available with the new approach until mid of January or latest until March 2026.

How is this concrete with the certification C_S43? When will it be available again?

I’m already curious to go for the new approach and I appreciate your assistance in advance for this.

Txs,

Mischa

entry.title: SAP Certified - Implementation Consultant - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, Financial Accounting
entry.content:
The SAP Certified - Implementation Consultant - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, Financial Accounting course contains the following information advisory:

 “This SAP Certification Exam will be replaced with a practical exam by end of January. No exams can be scheduled after December 31st. Scheduling will be open again once the new exam version is available.”.

Please advise if it’s still ok to go ahead with the study or await the release of the new exam version? Not sure if this will affect the course content?

entry.title: Retired exam format: C_ABAPD: SAP Certified Associate - Back-End Developer - ABAP Cloud
entry.content:
Hi, 

This came very abruptly and is very poorly communicated. I've been preparing for the exam and planned to take it in January.

"This SAP Certification Exam will be replaced with a practical exam by end of January. No exams can be scheduled after December 31st. Scheduling will be open again once the new exam version is available."

Why would the exam version be stopped without having a replacement in place while the content should stay the same?

This is very irresponsible to the time and resources we've invested in the certification. While we're ready for examination and have a deadline to adhere to, we're subjected to the change of format without sufficient warning, which we would need to spend more time to prepare for.

Is there a way we could access the certification exam of the "old" format for the month of January at least?

Thank you in advance.

Best regards,

Ivy

entry.title: Reccommended C_SEC "SAP Security Administration" Practical (not Theoretical) certification material?
entry.content:
Hello, I am looking to take the  C_SEC "SAP Certified Associate - Security Administrator" Practical (not Theoretical, as now that version of the examination is retired) certification: 

https://learning.sap.com/certifications/sap-certified-associate-security-administrator

Does anyone have recommendations on practice materials relevant to the practical version, that are not listed below? (because I am already reviewing them):

  • All "Recommended steps to prepare for the exam" Learning Journeys/Courses on the webpage
  • All digital exercises in each Learning Journey attached (quizzes, step-by-step exercises)
  • All Live Sessions attached to each Learning Journey (under "Level up your skills" section)
  • And the following Hands-On practice systems: Hands-on Practice for Exploring the Authorization Concept for SAP Fiori on SAP S/4HANA (for textbook ADM945), Hands-on Practice for Exploring the Authorization Concept for SAP S/4HANA and SAP Business Suite (for textbook ADM940)

 The Live Sessions directly recommended for this certification are spread out across several months, and not all of them have recordings of previous sessions. I'm not sure what other Hands-On Practice systems or Live Sessions would be beneficial as there are only two Hands-On practice systems directly recommended for this. 

Thank you for any advice

entry.title: SAP Certification - S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition, Financial Accounting
entry.content:
Hello everyone,
Just sharing my experience regarding booking a certification exam this January. I was under the impression that all certification exams had transitioned to a practical format and that the proctored theoretical (MCQ) version was no longer offered. However, when I took my exam today, I was surprised to find that it was still the MCQ format.

I’m now wondering whether the result of my exam is still considered valid. I’d appreciate it if anyone could share insights or clarify this.

Thanks in advance,
Anthony

entry.title: Certification - C_TS452 When is the new assessment available?
entry.content: I noticed that the C_TS452 assessment is shifting to a more practical format, which is great news! Do we have any clarity on when this new approach will be available? The phrase “very soon” feels a little vague.

entry.title: New Management Accounting certification exam (C_P2WCO_2023)?
entry.content:
Hi Community,

Has anyone taken the new Management Accounting certification exam (C_P2WCO_2023)? I was planning on taking the old certification exam (C_TS4CO_2023) when I saw that it was retiring. 

I'm just trying to understand if this new exam is the new "practical" open-book exam that SAP has been moving to, or if this is still the multiple choice style, just with a different exam code.

I want to make sure I'm properly prepared for the exam when I take it later this week.

Thank you!
